sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"特有的，显示特征的"之意。
means: peculiar ： 侧重指某人或某物本身与众不同；也可指种族、民族或性别，着重有其无可争议的特点。
characteristic ： 侧重指具有区别能力，典型的或本质的事物。
individual ： 指特指的人或物，着重其与众不同，强调可将其区别出的品质与特性。
distinctive ： 突出与众不同的或令人称赞的个性或特征。

sentence.Network_en: Chick peas have a distinctive, delicious and nutty flavour.
sentence.Network_cn: 鹰嘴豆有独特可口的坚果风味。

sentence.Network_en: Cooking with the lid on gives the food that distinctive smoky flavour.
sentence.Network_cn: 盖上盖子做会让这种食物有一种熏制般的独特风味。

sentence.Network_en: All their beds were distinctive; Mac'swas an iron affair with brass knobs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的床都各具特色；马克的床是张带球形黄铜柱头的铁家伙。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 真题网 - 2003年英语专业四级考试试题答案与详解 ... favourable 令人满意的;  distinctive 有特色的;  vacant 空的.
UNIT 10. Why People Work_旺旺英语教学网 ... persistence 坚持 distinctive 特殊的；与众不同的 coordination 协调.
distinctivedistinctive 表示差异 , 独特 , 特殊.
河西学院王芳主页 ... descent n. 降下，下坡，家世 distinctive a. 区别的；鉴别性的；有特色的 edible a. 可食的.

list.abs: distance formula 距离公式distinct roots 相异根distincr solution 相异解
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... distinctive a 有区别的 distinction n 区别；优秀 extinct a 灭绝的.
大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... distant adj. 远的 distinction n. 区别,差别 district n. 区域.
专四高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... curious about 好奇,想知道 distinct from 种类(风格)不同 doubtful of /about 怀疑.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... extinguish v 熄灭 distinct a 清楚的；明显的 distinctive a 有区别的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'serving to differentiate'): from late Latin distinctivus, from Latin distinct- 'distinguished' (see distinct)

entry.tran: 独特的;特别的;有特色的
entry.def: Something that is distinctive has a special quality or feature which makes it easily recognizable and different from other things of the same type.

means.word_mean: 1. of a feature that helps to distinguish a person or thing;

sentences.sentence: "Jerusalem has a distinctive Middle East flavor"- Curtis Wilkie

means.word_mean: 3. serving to distinguish or identify a species or group;

sentences.sentence: "the distinguishing mark of the species is its plumage"
"we were asked to describe any identifying marks or distinguishing features"

auth_sentence.content: They are part of what makes the BBC distinctive.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are part of what makes the BBC distinctive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are part of what makes the BBC distinctive.

auth_sentence.content: Their products are sufficiently well characterized to be distinctive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their products are sufficiently well characterized to be distinctive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their products are sufficiently well characterized to be distinctive.

auth_sentence.content: These regions are distinctive in having a Mediterranean climate.
auth_sentence.res_content: These regions are distinctive in having a Mediterranean climate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These regions are distinctive in having a Mediterranean climate.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =prick,表示"刺,刺激"; 2. 引申为火焰

stems_affixes.value_cn: 清楚的,明显的;[from]截然不同的
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+stinct刺,刺激→把刺分开→明显的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特别的;有特色的;与众不同的
stems_affixes.word_buile: distinct[adj.清楚的,明显的;[from]截然不同的]+ive表形容词→adj.特别的;有特色的;与众不同的
instinct[n.本能,直觉,天性]+ive表形容词→adj.本能的
distinct清楚的,明显的+ly表副词→adv.清楚地, 显然

stems_affixes.value_cn: 区别,差别;级别;特性;声望;显赫
stems_affixes.word_buile: distinct[adj.清楚的,明显的;[from]截然不同的]+ion表名词→n.区别,差别;级别;特性;声望;显赫
in内+stinct刺,刺激→内在的刺激,本能
in内+stig=stinct刺,刺激+ate使……→刺激别人内部→煽动

Sentence.sentence: The effect of policies generating long-term resource concentration has also created a distinctive set of universities which are research-led and commercially active.

means.word_mean: 有特色的, 与众不同的

sentences.en: She has a very distinctive way of walking.
sentences.cn: 她走路的样子与别人很不相同。
